page.title: 17ATTITUDES
page.content: Unemployment is high in this area,many people except unemployment as a way of lifeand feel a resentment toward government which does not seem to be helping to relieve the situation.Burglaries are also common and many people blame this on high unemployment.Other topics which cause concern in the area are the general pollution i.e. Litter,Graffitti and the vast amounts of dog excrets on pavements,park and beach areas.Members of the Royal family were generally well received recently although again there was some protest from the unemployed.However,Sunderland people are very attached to the area and prefer not to move awayfrom the area if possible. Vandalism is common in many of the poorer housing areas and the blocks of flats near the docks.
